# 2010 Cleveland State Vikings men's soccer team

The '''2009â€“10 Cleveland State Vikings men's soccer team''' represented Cleveland State University in the 2010-11 NCAA Division I men's soccer season. The team was led by fifth-year head coach Ali Kazemaini and played their home games at Krenzler Field.
